reference.shortdesc: The propvalue element contains the content of the second cell in a properties table row. This content indicates a value for the property type.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Values can be placed in separate property elements if they need separate descriptions. The proptype element need not be repeated.
section.draft-comment:
This feels like something that should be called out for processors.
Kris Eberlein, 26 October 2022
We currently also call out the following nuance in the properties topic:
"When a single property type takes multiple values, authors can create additional property elements and use only the propvalue and propdesc elements for each successive value."

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The propvalue element is specialized from stentry. It is defined in the reference module.
